content.rendered:
Main Campus

  • Arts & Communications 110
  • Arts & Communications 118
  • Barkley Building 28
  • COB 141
  • Founders Hall 206
  • Founders Hall 207
  • Hoover Building 200
  • Landis Academic Center 240
  • Leo Hall 130

Computer Lab Rules

  • Downloading illegal software and explicit material is prohibited.
  • Please respect other people in the lab.
  • No eating or drinking.
  • Do not remove any equipment from the lab.

Printer Cards

Printer cards can be purchased in the following locations: ACB 110, Wilson Library. To purchase a card, you MUST use a $ 1 bill. When you receive your card, it will have $.50 worth of credit on it. You can put additional credit on your card by first inserting your card into the machine and then putting in money. If you already have a print card that was purchased here, you may add value to the card at the following locations:  ACB 110, CC 216, FH 206, LAC 240, LEO 130, and Wilson Library.

If you need assistance, please contact the Service Desk at x4130.
